name: Blob Attack [LDJam #42]
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #42 Jam. This was our first game jam.

Game objective: collect all the hidden chest on the surface in order to increase your ammo. Then move to a portal (grey doors) and destroy all the blobs by placing your blocks to surround them before they reach 30.

Ver 1.1 Changes

  • Fixed a critical bug that prevented us from having 100 blobs spawn and crashed the game, so now we can have 100 instead of 30 and some other bugs.
  • Changed some graphical aspects and added cooldown indicator (the cooldown was in the game but there was no indicator).
  • Added instructions.

Ver 1.2 Changes

  • Tweaked difficulty: initial block ammo changed from 12 to 4 and Greater Blob has an extra layer of blobs around him.

Controls in game:

  • A, D: Move to left/right.
  • Left click: place block
  • Right click: remove block.
  • Spacebar: jump.
  • W: interact (use portal, open chest).

Controls in screen: Spacebar: next screen.
